example_with_blanks: Brian __________ Judy __________ to dinner and a movie.

meaning: ask many people the same question

meaning: wear something a few times so that it doesn't look/feel new

meaning: ask for an answer or opinion
example_with_blanks: The professor __________ me for question 1.

meaning: get to the same point as somebody else
example_with_blanks: You'll have to run faster than that if you want to __________ with Marty.

meaning: arrive and register at a hotel or airport
example_with_blanks: We will get the hotel keys when we __________.

__________ the crazy hair on that guy!

meaning: volunteer for a task or to give evidence
example_with_blanks: The woman __________ with her husband's finger prints.

meaning: make something fall to the ground
example_with_blanks: We had to __________ the old tree in our yard __________ after the storm.

meaning: pull in too closely in front of another vehicle
example_with_blanks: The bus driver got angry when that car __________.

meaning: start operating (of an engine or electrical device)
example_with_blanks: The air conditioner __________ when the temperature gets to 22°C.
The doctors __________ his leg because it was severely injured.

meaning: remove part of something (usually with scissors and paper)
example_with_blanks: I __________ this ad __________ of the newspaper.

__________ your coat __________ before you go outside. It's snowing!

meaning: take somebody/ something somewhere and leave them/it there
example_with_blanks: I have to __________ my sister __________ at work before I come over.

The picture that you hung up last night __________ this morning.

meaning: (of hair, teeth) become loose and unattached
example_with_blanks: His hair started to __________ when he was only 35.
I need to __________ how to fit the piano and the bookshelf in this room.

meaning: to write information in blanks, as on a form (BrE)
example_with_blanks: Please __________ the form with your name, address, and phone number.

meaning: to write information in blanks, as on a form (AmE)
example_with_blanks: The form must be __________ in capital letters.

meaning: do without being noticed or punished

meaning: recover from an illness, loss, difficulty

meaning: take the bride to the altar
example_with_blanks: My father __________ me __________ at my wedding.

meaning: give something to somebody for free
example_with_blanks: The library was __________ old books on Friday.

meaning: give to many people (usually at no cost)
example_with_blanks: They were __________ free perfume samples at the department store.

meaning: leave home to go on a social event
example_with_blanks: We're __________ for dinner tonight.

meaning: give something used to somebody else

meaning: to distribute to a group of people

__________ there. I'm sure you'll find a job very soon.
__________ while I grab my coat and shoes!

meaning: hold firmly using your hands or arms

__________ stirring until the liquid comes to a boil.

meaning: fail to support or help, disappoint
example_with_blanks: I need you to be on time. Don't __________ me __________ this time.

meaning: sign in (to a website, database etc)

meaning: sign out (of a website, database etc)

meaning: be careful, vigilant, and take notice
example_with_blanks: Look out! That car's going to hit you!

meaning: search and find information in a reference book or database

meaning: have a lot of respect for
example_with_blanks: My little sister has always __________ to me.

meaning: put what you are holding on a surface or floor

meaning: act extra special for people watching (usually boastfully)

meaning: continue doing something, limit yourself to one particular thing

__________ your socks and shoes and come in the lake!

meaning: remove from a place or thing

meaning: decrease the volume or strength (heat, light etc)

meaning: stop the energy flow, switch off

meaning: increase the volume or strength (heat, light etc)
